data.name: 逐鹿
data.detailed_description: A stand-alone turn-based war chess game with the theme of Chinese history. There is a one-time fee for the game. After payment, all plot copies and all functions will be open, including historical plots, generals dialogue, equipment acquisition and other functions, and there are no in-app purchase props and recharge entrances. The core gameplay is territorial competition, and diplomacy, construction, combat and other gameplay will also revolve around territorial competition.
data.about_the_game: A stand-alone turn-based war chess game with the theme of Chinese history. There is a one-time fee for the game. After payment, all plot copies and all functions will be open, including historical plots, generals dialogue, equipment acquisition and other functions, and there are no in-app purchase props and recharge entrances. The core gameplay is territorial competition, and diplomacy, construction, combat and other gameplay will also revolve around territorial competition.
data.short_description: A stand-alone turn-based war chess game with the theme of Chinese history. The core gameplay is territorial competition, and diplomacy, construction, combat and other gameplay will also revolve around territorial competition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440 或者 AMD Radeon equivalent 及更高
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440 或者 AMD Radeon equivalent 及更高
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 需64位 OSX+10
  • Processor: 10核
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
